name: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Tendou with Power Up Kit / 信長の野望・天道 with パワーアップキット
description: Nobunaga’s Ambition, a series synonymous with Historical Simulation Games, has now released an extension of the 13th release in that series, Nobunaga’s Ambition: Tendou, at the Steam Store as Nobunaga’s Ambition: Tendou w/Power-up Kit!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1 Japanese ver. Processor: Pentium®4 1.6GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1024*768 pixel over DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played Additional Notes: 64MB over VRAM
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1 Japanese ver. Processor: Multi-core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1280*720 pixel over, high-color DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played Additional Notes: 128MB over VRAM
